#summary How to get started quick and dirty.

= Quick start how-to for django-rcsfield =

* checkout the code
* run manage.py syncdb, you should see that rcsfield creates a bzr repo in the current project directory
* run manage.py runserver, go to http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/ and add some items to the example/entry model
* do multiple edits on the entries
* run manage.py shell and poke around with the api
